Plot: A thriller centered on a con artist, his wife, and a stranger who flee Athens after one of them is caught up in the death of a private detective.
Title: The Two Faces of January
Writer: Hossein Amini, Patricia Highsmith (based on the novel by)
Actors: Oscar Isaac, Viggo Mortensen, Kirsten Dunst, Daisy Bevan
tomatoConsensus: With striking visuals, complex characters, and Hitchcockian plot twists, The Two Faces of January offers a pleasantly pungent treat for fans of romantic thrillers.
